name: La Città Metafisica
description:
"La Città Metafisica" is a desktop VR experience designed to immerse yourself completely in the artistic world of Giorgio De Chirico and to observe the paintings from the same perspective as the painter.

A mysterious disappearance, a studio full of empty frames and a brave adventurer ready to save the day.

Will you be the one who embraces the mission? Will you be the defender of DeChirico’s art?

Visit the Metaphysical city and discover the places where the artist painted the artworks. Chat with Ettore, Andromaca and other mannequins, use your knowledge and achieve the goal.

Great honor is yet to come for who will bring back the paintings to the studio.

WASD:  Move                                                   R:  Place the canvas

Mouse movement:  View                          C:  Capture the picture

Shift:  Run                                                           E:  Bring along the canvas

Spacebar:  Jump                                             Tab:  InventoryEsc:  Menu/Pause

This VR experience has been developed for the Virtual Reality course of the Polytechnic  University of Turin, 2020/2021
